transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another, given approval.

approve.description: Approves the spender to withdraw tokens from your account.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw.

setTransferAgent.description: Assigns or removes a transfer agent.

releaseTokenTransfer.description: Releases the token transfer once conditions are met.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to an address.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

upgrade.description: Upgrades the contract with a new version.

setUpgradeAgent.description: Sets a new upgrade agent address.

canUpgrade.description: Checks if the token can be upgraded.

getUpgradeState.description: Returns the upgrade state of the token.

owner.description: Returns the owner address of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

setReleaseAgent.description: Sets an agent to release the tokens.

released.description: Checks if the token has been released for transfers.

allowance.description: Returns the allowance for a spender.
